lead_paragraph: The Virginia Quarterly Review, an award-winning literary journal, has canceled its winter issue and closed its offices after the suicide last month of its managing editor.
snippet: The Virginia Quarterly Review, an award-winning literary journal, has canceled its winter issue and closed its offices after the suicide last month of its managing editor.

headline.main: Virginia Literary Journal Cancels Issue After Suicide
headline.print_headline: Virginia Literary Journal Cancels Issue After Suicide

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
